Module com.bd
Package controller

Class ViewCustomersController

java.lang.Object
controller.ViewCustomersController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ViewCustomersController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The ViewCustomersController displays customer information in a Tableview. The page contains button links to add, modify, and delete customers.
Author:
Brandi Davis

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)

      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object

      Parameters:
      event - on action add customer button
      Throws:
      IOException - from FXMLLoader in the event of an error loading the AddCustomerController

    • onActionDeleteCustomer

      void onActionDeleteCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Deletes the selected customer from the database. Verifies if the customer has any appointments and will display an error prompt if they do Confirm deletion with confirmation prompt and refreshes the Customer Tableview
      Parameters:
      event - on action delete button

    • onActionModifyCustomer

      void onActionModifyCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Gathers the information for the selected customer and navigates to the UpdateCustomerController.
      Parameters:
      event - on action modify button
      Throws:
      IOException - from FXMLLoader in the event of an error loading the UpdateCustomerController
